title: Service Definition file
description: Schema for service definition files used by Mvno

Description.description: Fill out to get detailed info in the SCM about the service. Port and protocol are automatically added to the description.

Port.description: Port number must be in the 13K-14K range.

RunUnderAccount.description: Defaults to Local which has the lowest degree of permissions like no database access.

ApiRoutesToPublish.description: [Obsolete] Use 'RoutesToServe' instead. If specified, and a kubernetes cluster is included in the deploy, it will setup these URL's to forward to the deployed service.

RoutesToServe.description: Routes (api/ui) to expose public on the api-gateway for our customers.

Namespace.description: Describes which kubernetes namespace the application will run under

RequestTimeout.description: Timeout for incoming requests for the fields ApiRoutesToPublish and RoutesToServe in milliseconds.

Replicas.description: Number of pods running in kubernetes.

Scaling.description: Enables autoscaling in kubernetes based on load.

Resources.description: Describes the amount of compute resources the pod will have available.

CpuMin.description: Minimum of CPU units available by the pod. in the format milli-CPU "100m". 1000 units equals 1 CPU.

CpuMax.description: Maximum of CPU units available by the pod. in the format milli-CPU "100m". 1000 units equals 1 CPU.

MemoryMin.description: The minimum amount of memory available to the pod. E.g. "64Mi" for 64 megabit, "2Gi" for 2 gigabit etc.

MemoryMax.description: The maximum amount of memory available to the pod. E.g. "64Mi" for 64 megabit, "2Gi" for 2 gigabit etc.

Databases.description: Describes which databases the pod will have access to.

Schemas.description: The schemas which the pod needs access to.

InitContainers.description: Additional init containers that can be run before deploying the service to the pod.

GrantContainerAccessToSettings.description: [NotInUse] Gives the pod access to the local /settings folder.

ServiceAccount.description: Overrules the service account that the pod will be run under.

Ingress.description: Internal services you want to allow access to your services. By default.

GrantContainersAccessToSettings.description: Grant container access to settings (mount /settings to container)

UseHttps.description: Default false for all mvno applications until we are no longer onprem, since onprem do not support https

Egress.description: External services you want access to.

BypassAuthentication.description: Will cause api key check by ambassador-auth to be skipped

Type.description: One of 'consumer/api/ui/job' until you rename the service correctly

CronSchedule.description: Schedule for cronjobs. Use https://crontab.guru/ to generate schedules

ExecutionBehaviour.description: Defaults to 'schedule'. Use 'manual-trigger' to disable schedule, this means the job must be invoked directly using sre.ops-board.
